title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 199.1 - Label requirements for new and used bedding
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 199.1 - Label requirements for new and used bedding

State Regulations

In addition to the requirements set forth in sections
389-a
and
389-b
of
the General Business Law, each label for new or used bedding shall identify, as
appropriate, the name of the seller of the used bedding, the name of the
manufacturer of the new bedding, the name of the manufacturer of the used
bedding, or the name of repairer, renovator or rebuilder of used bedding. Each
label shall also indicate the method used to sanitize the used
bedding. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
199.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
